name: Ext_R5_ImplementationGuide_fhirVersion
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: FHIR Version(s) this Implementation Guide targets
element.definition: The version(s) of the FHIR specification that this ImplementationGuide targets - e.g. describes how to use. The value of this element is the formal version of the specification, without the revision number, e.g. [publication].[major].[minor], which is 4.6.0. for this version.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion` maps to R4B `ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
